channel.title: Spring 2024 on Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich
channel.description: Recent content in Spring 2024 on Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich

item.title: Pub Quiz 💡
item.description:
🎉 The second brain-teasing, laughter-filled night of fun this semester with your favourite people from CSSZ! Join us for yet another Pub Quiz night on May 6th at the one and only Oliver Twist Pub in Zurich! 🍻

🏆 Put your knowledge to the test and compete with friends or make new ones as you tackle a wide range of exciting and diverse questions. From pop culture and history to sports and general knowledge, there’s something for everyone.

item.title: Pub Quiz 💡
item.description:
🎉 Like every semester, get ready for a brain-teasing, laughter-filled night of fun with your favourite people from CSSZ! Join us for this Spring semester’s first Pub Quiz on March 3rd at the one and only Oliver Twist Pub in Zurich! 🍻

🏆 Put your knowledge to the test and compete with friends or make new ones as you tackle a wide range of exciting and diverse questions. From pop culture and history to sports and general knowledge, there’s something for everyone.

item.title: Semester Welcome Event (Spring 2024)
item.description: Join us for a lively kick-off to the Spring semester 2024 at the bQm bar 🍻, where the Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich will meet up for a beer⭐. This is a great opportunity for both new and existing students to meet🤝. We look forward to seeing you there! 🎉

item.title: Welcome to the Spring semester of 2024!
item.description: Welcome to the Spring semester of 2024! We are looking forward to meeting you at our events. See the list of events planned for the semester below.
